summary: Small guide on how to spawn and positioning objects in Skyrim with console directly in-game.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=\"#FF8C00\"][size=\"4\"]HOW TO DECORATE YOUR HOME IN SKYRIM:[/size][/color][/b]

This tutorial explains how to decorate your home in skyrim directly in-game,using only console commands:

[color=\"#FF8C00\"][b]Console commands:[/b][/color]
open console with tilde (~).

[b][color=\"#FF8C00\"]Free movement:[/color][/b]
tcl

[color=\"#FF8C00\"][b]Spawn object:[/b][/color]
Help \"name of object\" 0
shows \"name of object\" IDs

[color=\"#FF8C00\"][b]delete object:[/b][/color]
markfordelete
delete selected object.
spawned objects are immediatly delete,
pre-existent objects need save/load to be deleted.

[color=\"#FF8C00\"][b]Set angle of object:[/b][/color]
setangle x \"-+ number\"
setangle y \"-+ number\"
setangle z \"-+ number\"

[b][color=\"#FF8C00\"]Set position of object:[/color][/b]
setpos x \"-+ number\"
setpos y \"-+ number\"
setpos z \"-+ number\"

[color=\"#FF8C00\"][b]Let\'s start:[/b][/color]
Look images I uploaded from 1 to 10 to see how to use commands mentioned above:)

[b][color=\"#FF8C00\"]PS-[/color][/b]
If an object you spawned hasn\'t got collision:
[color=\"#FF8C00\"][b]1)[/b][/color]open console and select the object
[b][color=\"#FF8C00\"]2)[/color][/b]type:
  placeatme \"object ID\" 1 (use ID found with help \"Object name\" 0, NOT id shown by console when you select the object)
[color=\"#FF8C00\"][b]3)[/b][/color]markfordelete
it spawns a copy of the object in same position and angulation and remove the old no-collision object.


[b][color=\"#FF8C00\"]PS2-[/color][/b]
You can use setangle commando on objects you throw out of inventory simply when object is on the floor use command and when you pick up it again it will rotate.

If anyone knows a way to make object position permanent i\'d like to know how to do this,
because only forniture maintain position.
Thanks

by i3vdone
author: i3vdone
